foodsCategories.title: Best Whole Wheat
foodsCategories.subtitle: Chocolate Chippers
foodsCategories.description: A cookie is a baked or cooked food that is typically small, flat and sweet. It usually contains flour, sugar, egg, and some type of oil, fat, or butter. It may include other ingredients such as raisins, oats, chocolate chips, nuts, etc.
steps: Mix butter, sugar, egg and vanilla on a tray
Add flour, yeast and chocolate
Stir gently
Form small balls
Place on a greased shape

foodsCategories.title: Tasty and Delicious
foodsCategories.subtitle: Steak A Role
foodsCategories.description: A delicious steak to eat with the family on weekends, easy to make and quick in preparation
steps: Spice steaks with salt
Add onion and garlic
Mix well and stir for 30 minutes
Fill with bacon
Prepare tomato sauce
Mix for 10 minutes

foodsCategories.title: Simple Soft Cake
foodsCategories.subtitle: Simple Cakes
foodsCategories.description: A delight, and super cute. Simple Blended Cake Recipe!
steps: in the blender, beat the margarine, sugar and egg until it forms a homogeneous mixture
gradually add milk and flour, beating always
add the yeast and stir with a spoon until incorporated into the mixture
separate 1/3 of the dough and set aside
bring the dough to a shape, greased and floured
add the chocolate powder to the reserved dough and beat well
turn the black mass over the white mass, into the form, quite carefully
bake in medium, preheated oven, until it bakes

foodsCategories.title: Paçoca Cake
foodsCategories.subtitle: Simple Soft Cake
foodsCategories.description: Make an easy and tasty cake to eat with the family
steps: put the eggs, sweetener and butter in the mixer, beat everything until it becomes a fluffy cream

add the vanilla essence, and go alternating the milk with the wheat flour. Remove from the mixer and add the paçoquinhas in the form of farofa and the baking powder. Mix and place in a greased and floured form. Bake preheated at 180ºC for about 30 minutes
after roasting, wait to cool and cover the cake with the sweet milk and sprinkle the diet paçoca on top

foodsCategories.title: Chocolate Cake
foodsCategories.subtitle: Simple Soft Cake
foodsCategories.description: Soft and delicious Chocolate Cake to eat with friends
ingredients: 3 colheres de chá de fermento em pó
steps: In a bowl place the first 3 dried ingredients sifted and mix well. In a cup mix the 3 eggs and add in the mixture together with the oil, until the dough looks like a paste, after very well mixed, add the boiling water and stir, a very soft dough, add the salt the yeast and the sodium spourate and stir gently until well mixed,  place in a greased and floured shape, bake 180º to 200º for 30 to 40 minutes or until pierced with toothpick and it comes out clean
Bring to the fire all ingredients
After boiling let cook for 5 minutes over low heat stirring constantly
Place the topping on the cake and sprinkle with granulated chocolate
As soon as you turn on the heat to bake the cake, place a container with water in the oven, this will make the cake get more wet and juicy
Drill multiple holes in the cake with toothpick or fork so that the cover penetrates
